content.content: 1. (1) The following distributors’ service areas are identified as priority installations for the purposes of Ontario Regulation 427/06 (Smart Meters: Discretionary Metering Activity and Procurement Principles) made under the Act: 1. Chatham-Kent Hydro Inc. 2. Middlesex Power Distribution Corporation. 3. Milton Hydro Distribution Inc. 4. Newmarket Hydro Ltd. 5. Tay Hydro Electric Distribution Company Inc. 6. Toronto Hydro-Electric System Limited.  O. Reg. 428/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 198/09, s. 1 (1). (2) For purposes of subsection (1), a distributor’s service area includes the service area of any other distributor that has been acquired by a distributor referenced in subsection (1).  O. Reg. 198/09, s. 1 (2).  Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The following distributors’ service areas are identified as priority installations for the purposes of Ontario Regulation 427/06 (Smart Meters: Discretionary Metering Activity and Procurement Principles) made under the Act:

1. Chatham-Kent Hydro Inc.

2. Middlesex Power Distribution Corporation.

3. Milton Hydro Distribution Inc.

4. Newmarket Hydro Ltd.

5. Tay Hydro Electric Distribution Company Inc.

6. Toronto Hydro-Electric System Limited.  O. Reg. 428/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 198/09, s. 1 (1).

(2) For purposes of subsection (1), a distributor’s service area includes the service area of any other distributor that has been acquired by a distributor referenced in subsection (1).  O. Reg. 198/09, s. 1 (2).

 

Français
